meanings.definition: The act of heating to an extremely high temperature.
meanings.sent1: The ultraheating of the metal caused it to melt quickly.
meanings.sent2: The industrial furnace uses ultraheating to forge steel beams.
meanings.sent3: The chef's ultraheating of the soup turned it into steam in seconds!
meanings.sent4: The sun's intense rays felt like natural ultraheating on my skin.
meanings.sent5: The dragon's breath was like a wave of ultraheating, scorching everything in its path.

meanings.definition: A device or system that provides intense heat.
meanings.sent1: The ultraheating in the heater kept the room warm during winter.
meanings.sent2: The ultraheating from the fireplace made the living room cozy.
meanings.sent3: The ultraheating device malfunctioned, causing the room to become too hot.
meanings.sent4: The ultraheating system hummed softly as it circulated warmth throughout the house.
meanings.sent5: The ultraheating unit glowed red as it radiated heat into the chilly room.

meanings.definition: The process of rapidly increasing the temperature of something.
meanings.sent1: The ultraheating of the water turned it into steam in seconds.
meanings.sent2: The ultraheating of the oven quickly baked the cookies to perfection.
meanings.sent3: The ultraheating of the hairdryer dried my hair in record time.
meanings.sent4: The ultraheating of the engine caused it to roar to life.
meanings.sent5: The ultraheating of the atmosphere created a sudden storm.
